definition: (of a smell) strong/peak season (of a crop)/(classifier for the ordinal number of a crop, in the context of multiple harvests)

sentences.english: Frosted slides are sandblasted for marking specimens.
sentences.chinese: 磨砂的载玻片经喷砂处理以标记标本。

sentences.english: With the theory of gas-solid two-phase flow, computer simulation of sandblasting process was discussed.
sentences.chinese: 运用气固两相流动理论对喷砂过程进行了模拟和仿真。

sentences.english: Hydrofluoric acid-etching and sandblasting had obvious effect on ceramic surface structure.
sentences.chinese: 氢氟酸及喷砂处理对瓷表面形态改变明显。

sentences.english: Objective : To measure the fracture resistance of teeth restored with surface sandblasted casting posts .
sentences.chinese: 研究铸造桩表面喷砂处理对牙根抗折性能的影响。

sentences.english: The surfaces of metal plates were made by peening with glass spheres and planer.
sentences.chinese: 金属板的表面粗糙度通过喷砂和刨床加工控制。

sentences.english: Star Maling Epoxy Primer can be used as a corrosion resistant primer on abrasive blasted steel.
sentences.chinese: 可作为防锈底漆，适用于喷砂处理的钢材表面。

sentences.english: Double frosted slides are sandblasted on one end of both sides.
sentences.chinese: 双磨砂面在双面的一端经过喷砂处理。

sentences.english: All areas which are not to be coated shall be protected from abrasive blast cleaning.
sentences.chinese: 应保护好所有不准备涂敷的区域不进行喷砂处理。

sentences.english: To all our friends to provide technical guidance for sandblasting .
sentences.chinese: 为各位朋友提供喷砂技术指导。

sentences.english: After years of efforts has developed a range of sand blasting equipment.
sentences.chinese: 经过多年的努力已开发出一系列完善的喷砂设备。

sentences.english: There are 2 new well completions, that are hydraulic sand jet perforation and hydraulic slotted liner technique.
sentences.chinese: 有2项新型完井工艺，即水力喷砂射孔和水力割缝。

sentences.english: To all our friends to provide other brands of sandblasting machine maintenance services.
sentences.chinese: 为各位朋友提供其他厂牌的喷砂机维修服务。

sentences.english: It the function of time automatic sand-blasting and point-locating.
sentences.chinese: 具备定时自动喷砂，点动定位功能。

sentences.english: Frosted slides are sandblasted on one end of one side.
sentences.chinese: 磨砂的载玻片在一面的一端经过喷砂处理。

sentences.english: On function basically as similar as ground glass, change differently grind arenaceous for gush arenaceous .
sentences.chinese: 性能上基本上与磨砂玻璃相似，不同的改磨砂为喷砂。

definition: to scrub with an abrasive/to sand/frosted (e.g. glass)
the coating of sth that has been chrome-plated or copper-plated etc
acrylic (loanword)/see also 壓克力|压克力[ya1 ke4 li4]
